SA10n1035:2: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai |
SA10n1035:3: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai ||1 ||
SA10n1035:4: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā |
SA10n1035:5: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā ||2 ||
SA10n1035:7: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate ||3 ||
SA10n1035:8: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā |
SA10n1035:9: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate ||4 ||
SA10n1035:11: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate ||5 ||
SA10n1035:13: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate ||6 ||
SA10n1035:15: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca ||7 ||
SA10n1035:16: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate |
SA10n1035:17: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate ||8 ||
SA10n1035:26: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate |
SA10n1035:30: prasajyate sa bhāvo hi nityo'nityo'tha vā bhavet ||14 ||
SA10n1035:37: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ |
SA10n1035:38: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ ||18 ||
SA10n1035:42: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate ||20 ||
SA10n1035:43: evaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu na yuktā bhavasaṃtatiḥ |
SA10n1035:44: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ ||21 ||
